channel.title: Department on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Department on PepsFeeder

item.title: The Health Department website was attacked in the middle of the coronavirus pandemic
item.description: The US Health and Human Services Department was the victim of a cyberattack yesterday, the agency confirmed to Recode. Bloomberg, which was first to report the attack on Monday morning, initially described it as a hack, but updates to its story removed the word “hack,” instead referring to it as “multiple incidents of a cyber intrusion.
